title: Designing Interactive Video Learning for STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary STEM concepts and digital device operation proficiency
context.additional_context: Operating 15-minute microlearning sessions using mobile devices for graduate students enrolled in secondary education programs

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain STEM concepts over 80% of the time using quiz-embedded interactive videos
Learners can analyze complex physical phenomena step-by-step by replaying/looping segments using in-video navigation features
Learners improve their ability to interpret experimental data by over 70% through microlearning activities that include a feedback system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
